content: CFS-T anchor plate sets Anchor plate sets to secure cable modules within a transit frame and increase pressure-tightness ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Accessories for firestop & fire protection- - - ### FEATURES:Features Sealing against static and dynamic pressure Easier installation of modules and insertion of the wedge seal Anchor plates available in galvanized steel, stainless steel grade 1.4301 (AISI 304) or aluminum Fixing anchor plates available in galvanized steel or stainless steel grade 1.4301 (AISI 304) Applications Penetrations in shipbuilding and offshore applications Penetrations in wind power structures Use one anchor plate between each row of modules and also to secure the CFS-T WD 120 wedge Telecoms, data centers, downstream (oil and gas), petro-chem, control rooms, health care, emergency power, transmission towers For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approvals: UL Temperature resistance range: -40 - 122 °F Free from: Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) Technical Data | Approvals | UL | Temperature resistance range | -40 - 122 °F | Free from | Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) ### ITEMS- 2233912 - Anchor plate CFS-T AP 120 S/S - Package Size 5 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-T AP S/S Anchor plate assy - 2233910 - CFS-T FAP 120 GS fixing anchor plate (Galvanized) - 5 pieces/box - Package Size 5 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-T FAP GS Anchor plate assy - 2014882 - CFS-T AP 120 GS kit anchor plate - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-T AP GS Anchor plate assy - 1x CFS-T FAP GS Anchor plate assy - 2014923 - CFS-T FAP 120 S/S kit anchor plate - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-T FAP S/S Anchor plate assy
